resources.string:
"COMPANY'S PROFILE

" "Ambience 

" "This is a perfect location and no matter the occasion, you are guaranteed a unique dining experience.
" "Whether you are after an intimate dinner for two or a private party, we cater for all.
" "We boasts a separate Bollywood function room with a seating capacity for up to 40 people.
" "The Bollywood room has its own bar and sound system so you can enjoy a truly sensational and private event.


"
"Menu 

" "We also boasts an innovative menu, which is prepared with only the freshest and finest ingredients. 
" "It has a comprehensive menu with a variety of vegetarian, meat and fish dishes.
" "The menu caters for all palettes with its offer of a variety of traditional and contemporary Indian cuisine.
" "All our dishes are prepared with a genuine passion for creating authentic and mouth-watering food.


"
"If you have a sweet tooth, then you are in for a real treat. Not only do we offer home favourites such as ras malai, we also have 10 varieties of Movenpick Swiss Ice Cream.


"
"The kitchen staff here available are amongst the finest, bringing with them experiences from cooking in five star restaurants in India.
" "We are also pleased to have the Head chef and pioneer for the much loved menu at Sheesh Mahal join our team.

" "A full take away menu is available, for collection only.



" "-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

"
